meanings.definition: To surpass in competition or rivalry.
meanings.sent1: The cheetah outcompetes the other animals in the race.
meanings.sent2: In the business world, innovation often outcompetes tradition.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel outcompetes the birds for the best spot to gather nuts.
meanings.sent4: Her determination outcompetes any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sun outcompetes the moon in brightness, lighting up the night sky.

meanings.definition: To be more successful than others in a competitive situation.
meanings.sent1: The young athlete outcompetes the older competitors with his speed.
meanings.sent2: Hard work and dedication can help you outcompetes your peers.
meanings.sent3: The student outcompetes his classmates in the spelling bee by studying diligently.
meanings.sent4: His creativity outcompetes others in the art competition, earning him first place.
meanings.sent5: The champion outcompetes all challengers, proving his skill and determination.
